backstoryInfo.title: Empire subject
backstoryInfo.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was enslaved to the Empire and tested to handle the Mincho. But the experiment failed, and {PAWN_nameDef} escaped.

backstoryInfo.title: Mincho worshipper witch
backstoryInfo.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has been worshipping Minchoes as her master, even after she escaped from the Institute of psychic. She is using her psychic to transform every human, human-type creature in the world into the Mincho.
